title: Anthony Totten
text:
Anthony Totten (born 11 February 1969) is an Australian former professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1980s and 1990s.
He was born in <a href="Canterbury%2C%20New%20South%20Wales">Canterbury, New South Wales</a>. A St. George junior from <a href="Bexley%20North%2C%20New%20South%20Wales">Bexley North, New South Wales</a>, Anthony Totten appeared with the <a href="Sydney%20Roosters">Sydney Roosters</a> for two seasons between 1989-1991. He played 12 first grade games with the club, scored 6 tries and kicked 14 goals, scoring a total of 52 points for the club. He is listed as the Sydney Roosters 858th player.
